law.catch_line: Personal And Individual Liability To Commonwealth Upon Failure To Pay Amount Due Under This Chapter
law.text: A person who fails to pay to the commissioner any sum required to be paid under this chapter shall be personally and individually liable therefor to the commonwealth. For the purposes of this section, “person” shall include, but not be limited to, an officer or employee of a corporation or a member or employee of a partnership or limited liability company who, as such officer, employee or member, is under a duty to pay over the taxes imposed by this chapter.
